title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout, the image is not refreshed and the original image remains displayed.
OB: When importing a new image into the layout, the original image is still displayed.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout, the new image should be displayed.
SR:
1. Open the layout. 
2. Import a new image (e.g., 'image1.jpg') into the layout. 
3. Check if the new image is displayed.
